choices: Brunette, and a little thick in the hips, thighs and lips.
Blonde, a slender build but taller.
A red headed giantess with green eyes and full lips.
Hispanic, with curves in all the right places and dark brown hair.
More Choices!
1.content: Our story begins in a tiny ant hill in a backyard. Hundred of concerned ants scurry and gather in front of a giant wanted poster that reads, "GIANTESS, AT LARGE". Talking amongst each other in panic they cry out "The giant is coming!" "What will we do?!" "She crushes our houses!" "She eats all our food sources!" "How can we stop her?!" Zooming out the ants are all actually gathered in front of a photograph that they brought underground to serve as a makeshift wanted poster. But what does this giant female terror look like?
1.title: The giantess is coming!

choices: 5 MINUTES LATER!
11.content:
A photograph of a woman in her 20's was before the panicked crowd of ants, even though it was merely a photograph of the owner of the land the ants resided in it was still intimidating. She stood only 5'5 in human measurements but even to the ants the photo made her look huge! She wore strap sandals and short blue jean shorts and a white tank top that was a little tight and showed off a not so modest cleavage. Her shorts seemed to struggle to fit her bulging thighs and her hips, she didn't have a muffin top but still it was a tight fit! She wore glasses and smiled with red lipstick in the photograph. Her smile giving her an innocent look... but the ants knew better. This "innocent" looking girl was the source of much of their woes amongst their hidden world. Many of the townsfolk family members had been crushed into pulp by this unaware terror as she stomped through her backyard and patio. Others were drowned by the massive water falls she made when she summoned powerful founts of water from her giant garden hose, and even worse... there were rumors of a party of ants who had gone out for an afternoon and drawn to a colossal patio table with enormous amounts of food. They were never heard from again, assumed to have either been crushed flat by the giantess or worse... unknowingly eaten alive! Miles away (ant miles that is) a group of ants were perched up on a windowsill at the neighbors house listening in on a conversation a man was having on the phone.

"YEAH DUDE IM TELLING YOU PICKING UP ON WOMEN IS EASY! I'VE SLAIN PLENTY OF WOMEN IN MY TIME TAKE IT FROM ME!"

the ants continued their conversation... wow... did you hear that? He just said he's slain plenty of women... you don't think he means it do you?

Sudden the the man unknowingly to him got close to the ants on the windowsill and yelled out while talking to his friend on the phone "IM SERIOUS! THIS ONE TIME, I SLAYED SEVEN IN ONE BLOW!"

in unison and in shock the group of ants yelled out to each other "SEVEN IN ONE BLOW?!
"well that settles it... the king and our scientist who is in charge of the ANT-ITIZER have gotta hear about this!"
11.title: Brunette, and a little thick in the hips, thigh...

choices: what are you waiting for you fool RUN LIKE HELL!
attempt to scream louder to get her to see you
111.content:
You aren't sure how it happened but the next thing you know you're in a giant forest? No it's a forest of grass blades. "What the... where? Who?" Suddenly ants from behind you say "Good luck! We have brought you to your neighbors house, defeat the giantess and we will restore your size giant slayer!"

"Wait no I'm not a giant slayer... I'm a person!"

Suddenly large tremors can be heard. Small at first but it starts to get louder...

"Well best of luck to you she approaches!" The ants all scurry away.

*boom...boom...Boom...BOOM...BOOM*

You've never met your neighbor before as you are new to the area but you get the small sinking feeling you're about to get to know her a hell of a lot more than you wanted to.

*BOOM! BOOM! BOOM*

you turn around and see the colossal figure that is your neighbor. being the size of an ant... she is simply put... GIGANTIC!

She looks to be a young woman in her mid 20's... not overweight but no skinny either... she has thick legs that struggle to stay inside of her blue jean shorts. She is wearing a jean top and her stomach very slightly pokes over the top. She is wearing brown strap flip-flops. As you lean back to fully grasp her immense size you say to yourself....

"My God... she's...she's... HUMUNGOUS!"
"Hey down here!" you call out!

*BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!"

the giantess continues her casual stride through what to her appears to be her back yard.

You better do something and quick, she is heading right for where you are and doesn't seem to be planning on stopping any time soon!
111.title: 5 MINUTES LATER!

choices: an assortment of blueberries in a carton
in her pitcher of tea
right where she is about to sit down
1111.content:
"Gasp!"
you make a run for it!

The giant woman is right behind you and the booming is now almost deafening

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

The giantess continues her casual walk in her backyard. To her she is simply walking over to a pick nick she has prepared for herself to enjoy in her backyard today... unknown to her at her a feet. A struggle continues on.

BOOM! you see her towering figure right on top of you and decide there's no way you can out run her and at this rate she will stomp you flat so you hop onto the sandals and grab a hold of one of her painted to nails. You can help but feel like a speck now as you watch debri and rocks go flying from out of her flip flop as the giant woman who's foot you are riding continues to walk through her yard. You both finally approach the blanket she has laid out with food and drink for herself

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! Suddenly you feel your self lurched forward completely as in a swift motion the giantess kicks off both of her sandals.

"WAHHHHHHHHHH!"

you are sent flying and land
1111.title: what are you waiting for you fool RUN LIKE HELL!

choices: yes she snatches you up
no she didn't get you but she got half the carton!
11111.content:
*spat* you land in to what to you is a giant sized carton of blueberries. They look fresh like they were just picked up at the store. You turn around and see the giantess striding just a few more steps...

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

she casually steps over a large pillow she has already laid down on her picnic blanket and then you see her huge form lean forward and lower her large butt down as she sits... terrified by her huge sight you dive into the blue berries and hide under a giant berry that you landed on.

Then for just a moment you stick your head out from under the purple pile and see the giantess adjusting herself to make herself comfy and then stretching her arms up and yawning deep and loudly.. You look up and now she appears even larger now that she's stretching and yawning leaned back slightly... you look up and see her mouth opened widely and just seeing it sends chills down your spine...

*gulp... "there's still time but I've gotta get out of these berries before she decides to devour them along with me if I don't hurry I'm food!"

The giantess, finished with her long stretch looks down at the carton of yummy blueberries before her and says something that strikes fear into your heart...

"MMMMM... F-FOOD!"
The giantess then licks her lips

You look up and see her giant hand opened up and eagerly swooping down to claim as many tasty blueberries as possible for the giantess to devour.

Are you in the handful?
11111.title: an assortment of blueberries in a carton

choices: you see what happens in the mouth and get chewed
you get swallowed
111111.content: Add on to the story.......
111111.title: yes she snatches you up

choices: You swim down, hoping to escape
Stay here, wait for something to happen
1111112.content:
What comes next is chaos and carnage, as you and a whole bunch of blueberries that were larger than you were tipped into the awaiting maw of this goddess. You couldn't fight against the rolling boulders and were swept inside her mouth. There, you were tossed about in the darkness as she merrily chewed. Then as quickly as you had arrived in her mouth, you were swallowed down into her gaping gullet.

You slid down the massive tunnel that formed her esophagus, plummeting all the way down into the deep, dark ocean in her belly below. You were in her stomach. Looking around the dark cavern, you realise that you need to find a way out of her belly. She had such a sexy belly, with just the right amount of pudge... and now you were inside it. Her tummy gurgled around you. A sign of hunger perhaps? Or maybe digestion was starting... You start to think about possible methods of escape from this place. Going up was nigh impossible. You would probably have to go down... Not your favourite revelation, but perhaps a necessary one.
1111112.title: In the Belly of the Babe

choices: Run away from the approaching foot.
Foot hits the front of the colony.
Something else.
12.content:
The picture was of a blondie in her mid 20's, She was wearing a tank that showing the right amount of cleavage, she was wearing flip-flops, with short shorts. The ant leader said to the crowd."THIS GIANTESS MENACE MUST BE STOP OR SHE WILL DESTROY US ALL"! The crowd gasp in horror, the leader continued. "BUT, WE HAVE CREATED A MACHINE TO SHRINK ONE OF THE HUMANS, WE CHOSE THIS HUMAN MALE"!

This were you come in, it was sunny day, you were watering your plants. You were suddenly startled by your beautiful neighbour, Sue, she asked. "Hey George, what you doing? You respond. "Just watering the plants, what are you doing"? She smiled and simply answered. "Some stuff I do all the time, but anyway i'll talk to you later".

You simply wave goodbye, but suddenly you start feeling dizzy. You feel like your shrinking and then you passout. You wake up, looking at a crowd of ant human hybrids. You scream. "WHERE THE HELL AM I". The ant leader replies. "Welcome to our home, we need you human, to stop the giantess. The crowd around you step a way in fear and whispered giantess. You ask them. "Of all the people why me, and whos the giantess"? Just as the ant leader is about to speak, this large booming noise in the distance. All the ants run way to safety. The ant leader grabs your arm and pulls you up to the surface, he simply points in fear, you look and see two flip-flop wearing feet approaching, and then you look up in awe to see the evil giantess, You say. "Sue"? She says in a booming voice. "HOPE YOU DIDN'T MISS ME ANTS, NOW FACE THE WRAITH OF YOUR GODDESS!!! She lifts here foot above the colony.

What do you do?
12.title: Blonde, a slender build but taller.

choices: Loses his grip.
Gets back on the ceiling fan.
122.content:
The flip-flop lands in front the colony, you suddenly feel rage in sue, you walk foward and turn you head and say. "I'll save you, but you have to turn me back to my size". You then jolt towards the flip-flop and take a leap of faith on the front and land on it. Sue said in her booming voice. "THIS IS YOUR LUCKY DAY, I'M GOING TO GO BACK TO MY HIVE, AND LATER YOU WILL FACE MY WRAITH"! She turns and starts walking towards the house.

When you are on her foot you are thinking why is she doing this, then the two of you reach her house, she opens a glass slide open door, from your perspective you are in the kitchen. Her hand extends down to grab her flip-flops, you hold on tight, she has you and the flip-flops in her hand and throws them on the kitchen table.

You go flying in the air, you started screaming, but the you hit the ceiling fan, and your holding on tight. A couple seconds has past and your losing you grip, you start chanting really fast. "Shit, Shit......". Over and over again. Then.........
122.title: Lets hope this works

choices: She eats him.
She stops and does something else.
1221.content:
You lose your gripping screaming the words. "SSSSHHHIIIITTTTT". You fall in this white substance, your swimming around in it a look up to see Sue's beautiful face eating some food with a spoon hovering above you. You quickly notice that you are in a cereal bowl. Sue suddenly says. "I WOULD EAT CEREAL ALL DAY IF I COULD". You start screaming as she lowers her spoon and scoops you up.

What happens?
1221.title: Off of the ceiling fan into the cereal bowl.

12211.content: The spoon came closer to Sue's face, with her mouth opening. You scream. "SUE, ITS ME GEORGE CAN YOU SEE ME"!! The spoon is put into her mouth and then ,*crunch*
12211.title: She eats him.

choices: Stop her.
Stay and help the ant hill.
13.content:
(Lets Change it up a bit)


On the poster the giantess looked like she was in her early 30's, she was wearing a tee shrit, short jeans, and high heels. All the ant people looked at there final resource, it was machine made out of scraps.

Your a 10 year old sitting on your deck. Your gorgeous Mother (Same one on the picture) calls your name. "Mike, honey I'm going to go out for a bit". You nod your head goodbye a she leaves, you put your hands in your pocket and starting walking in your backyard. Then suddenly you start shrinking you scream. "What the heck is going on"! You keep shrink till your the size of an Ant.

You are standing on the floor of the backyard. From all sides ants are coming at you, One stands up and says. Don't be alarmed human, I'm Commander Jèk commander of the ant forces, and we need your help to stop this giantess he pulls out a picture of your Mom, you look at it in confusion and say. "Mom"? They then take you back to the ant hill. You then hear this large booming noise, everyone looks back to see a lone ant running and screaming. "SHES COMING RUN FOR YOUR LI.....". The end of a giant high heel crushes him. You look up to see your Mother. Everyone in screaming and running around, you start sprinting to the ant hill and a giant foot nearly crushes you and lands on the ant hill. Then the foot retreats back to your house. You look at the wreckage, and passout from shock.

You have dream. Your in your living room shrunk, and look up and see your Mother looking for you, scream but only clicking comes out, you then look at your hands and instead they are insect legs, and you realize your an ant. You look up to see your Mother spot and scream. "Gross, an ant". She lifts her barefoot and stomps on you. You wake up screaming, Commander is sitting beside you and asks. "Do you want to stay or stop her"?
13.title: A red headed giantess with green eyes and full ...

choices: The confrontation
The big foot
132.content: You decide to stay and help. Jek tells you've been out an hour. He gives you information saying that your mother unknowingly kills his people. His brother Xev, got stuck on a piece of tape while searching for food. You're mother walked in barefoot and crushed him unaware. You thought to yourself, "I remember my mom a couple of months ago put her tired feet up on the table and dozed off. I could see a tiny ant stuck on tape on her foot. How sad." Just then, the ant hide out rumbled. It's her. You and Jek went out side into the lush green grass. The blades were as big as buildings. You climb up some small rocks to get a good view. Your mother is standing in the middle of the back yard and humming but it's in a very low tone, almost like a tuba. She has also changed clothes. Now wearing shorts, a top and is barefoot. Then, she begins to move but slowly. You quickly climb down the pebble you are on and begin to run. you can hear grass being crushed under her emense weight. It sounds like thousands of trees falling. You suddenly trip and your mom is practically on top of you...
132.title: Stay and help the ant hill.

1322.content:
You are shaken from the fall. You look up and can see only dirt and flesh. You relize your mon kept walking and was totally oblivious to you and the ants. Her sole must be as big as a small city. This all happens in slow motion. Her foot hasn't even touched the grass and is still descending. Dirt specks the size of houses begin falling off her huge dirty sole. You scream, "MOM!" but her foot still falls. You are now crawling because it is useless to run. You begin to her the grass being to break. Her sole is now crushing the grass. Maybe you can make it between her toes? No. As you look towards the sky again they are miles away. You are doomed. You think back when you and your mom would play together. Then her foot smell hits you. It smells like fritos and concrete. Her sole now touches your body. It's hard and dry like the pavement. You can feel pressure and then...
Death...
1322.title: The big foot

choices: An orient. Thin, Cute, Hates ants
An African American. Huge booty with a attitude
Indian. Very alluring with exotic features
A muilti-racial goddess

15.title: More Choices!

info.brief_description: Disney's Brave Little Tailor meets The Ant Bully meets a Giantess!
info.description: A "small" kingdom of ants who live in the backyard of your neighbor are being terrorized by a giantess at "large" this giantess happens to be your neighbor. The ants build a machine designed to shrink a human down to the size of an ant in an attempt to make communication with a human who can rid their kingdom of your giantess neighbor. They end up picking you for the job! *Please try to follow the plot of the original Disney story somewhat, minus the male giant of course* If you need a synopis and idea watch this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vP69o2IZzho or visit this website here http://www.mousevinyl.com/content/walt-disneys-story-mickey-mouse-brave-little-t... Try to keep it unaware most of the time remember the "hero" has been shrunk down to ant size!
info.pretty_title: The Brave Little Ant, a Giantess tale
